favourite.article: This exact stanza of the hymn touches me most. Lord, I consecrate myself unto You. My time, my life, my riches, future too, You're the One on whom I pour everything.. That's because I love You..
Oh Lord how refreshing You are. Thank You we can experience You in such an intimate way... We just consecrate ourselves to You and For Your purpose...How we love You Lord Jesus.

i really love the content of this hymn.... it keeps on ringing in my heart...♪(๑ᴖ◡ᴖ๑)♪ Lord, You’re living right inside of me. And I see, Lord You are for me... You loved me before time ever began. And I see You really love me... You’re the One who loves me as Your sheep. And I see, Lord, You shepherd me... You’re the only One who I will pursue. ’Cause I see, Lord, You are lovely. t’s because Your being captivates me. And I see I’m in love with You... There is nothing else on earth for me. And I see, Lord, You are my goal... Lord now I see... i'm just meant for Your economy... nothing can ever satisfy me than You do... may I see and treasure You more... ♪~♪ ヽ໒(⌒o⌒)७ﾉ ♪~♪
I love You, Lord, for You are everything to me...in whom I find my true rest.
Lord, You’re with me when I’m by myself, Always comforting me when I’m lonely, You’re the One in whom I find my true rest, And You satisfy me...
